info.name: deep 29input
info.description:
9input is 3x3 pixel grid
18input is 2 layers of 3x3 pixel grid, grids reads from 1st,2nd previous frames
29input is 5x5 pixel grid plus 4 pixels at north-south-east-west border of grid

renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define A(u) texture(iChannel0,(u)/iResolution.xy)
void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 u )
{
    vec4 a = +A(u+vec2( 1, 0))
             +A(u+vec2( 0, 1))
             +A(u+vec2(-1, 0))
             +A(u+vec2( 0,-1))
             +A(u+vec2( 1, 1))
             +A(u+vec2(-1, 1))
             +A(u+vec2( 1,-1))
             +A(u+vec2(-1,-1))
             +A(u+vec2( 0, 0))
             
             +A(u+vec2( 2,-2))
             +A(u+vec2( 2,-1))
             +A(u+vec2( 2, 0))
             +A(u+vec2( 2, 1))
             +A(u+vec2( 2, 2))
             +A(u+vec2( 1, 2))
             +A(u+vec2( 0, 2))
             +A(u+vec2(-1, 2))
             +A(u+vec2(-2, 2))
             +A(u+vec2(-2, 1))
             +A(u+vec2(-2, 0))
             +A(u+vec2(-2,-1))
             +A(u+vec2(-2,-2))
             +A(u+vec2(-1,-2))
             +A(u+vec2( 0,-2))
             +A(u+vec2( 1,-2))
             
             +A(u+vec2( 3, 0))
             +A(u+vec2( 0, 3))
             +A(u+vec2(-3, 0))
             +A(u+vec2( 0,-3));
    uint s = uint(dot(a,vec4(1,0,0,0)));
    vec4 o = A(u+vec2(0,0)).xxyz;
         o.x=float(((+16U*8U*16U*8U* (1U<<12U)
                     +16U*8U*16U*    0U
                     +16U*8U*        0U
                     +16U*           0U
                     +               15U)>>s)&1U);

    if(iFrame==0||iMouse.z>.5)
    {
        vec2 v = 1.*(u        *2.-iResolution.xy)/iResolution.y;
        vec2 m = 1.*(iMouse.xy*2.-iResolution.xy)/iResolution.y;
        o = floor(fract(cos(dot(u,vec2(1.76543,iTime+22.5363)))*vec4(2467.5678,
                                                                     3467.5678,
                                                                     4467.5678,
                                                                     5467.5678))+.1);
        o*= step(dot(v,v),dot(m,m)*.5);
    }
    fragColor = o;
}
renderpass.name: Buffer A
